QuestData.Title: Apply This Twice A Day
QuestData.Description: This elixir should protect against their spit. Offer it to Ko'char for me, will you? Tell him there's plenty more where that came from if he'll return the favor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Offer the elixir that Zort has prepared to Ko'char the Unbreakable.
QuestData.CompletionText: The runt wants us to fight for him I assume. This is my surprise face.
QuestData.RewardText: I will be blunt little one - I do not trust this mixture, and I will not use it. Keep it... if you find more trust in the green runt than I do, perhaps it will be of use to you.
